note: I am a vegan nerd who loves vintage computers, C64 and Amiga in particular. I use Linux exclusively since Oct. 2021 and I still have a lot to learn. I earn my money building electronic things. I sold my car and use my bicycle instead or public transportation, if time or distance won't let me use my bike. I vote left-green and I try to keep away from Google, Facebook and co. I love videogames and everything about the dystopian future fascinates me. I try to fix things before I trash them.
